Sentencas: Mixed transition-metal oxide coatings are commonly applied to stainless steel interconnects for solid oxide cell stacks.
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: Such coatings reduce oxidation and Cr evaporation rates, leading to improved degradation rate and stack lifetime.
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: Here, the ChromLok (TM) MCO-based composition (Mn,Co)(3)O-4 is applied to Crofer 22 APU stainless steel and evaluated specifically for application in solid oxide electrolyzer stacks operating around 800 degrees C and utilizing oxygen-ion-conducting solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: The MCO coating is found to decrease the stainless steel oxidation rate by about one order of magnitude, and decrease the Cr evaporation rate by fourfold.
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: The coating also dramatically lowers the rate of area-specific resistance increase for stainless steel coupons oxidized for 500 h with constant current applied, from 33 m Omega*cm(2)
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: kh(-1) for an uncoated coupon to less than 4 m Omega*cm(2)
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis
Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis

Sentencas: The coating is demonstrated on full-scale interconnects for single-cells, where the coating dramatically reduces degradation rate, and for a stack, which displays stable operation for 700 h. (C) 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Performance of stainless steel interconnects with (Mn,Co)3O4-Based coating for solid oxide electrolysis
